price: 他们带着从安拉发出的赏赐和恩惠转回来，他们没有遭受任何损失，他们追求安拉的喜悦。安拉是有宏恩的。
arabic: فَٱنقَلَبُواْ بِنِعۡمَةٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضۡلٖ لَّمۡ يَمۡسَسۡهُمۡ سُوٓءٞ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو فَضۡلٍ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fa-inqalabū biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin lam yamsashum sūon wa-ittabaʿū riḍ'wāna al-lahi wal-lahu dhū faḍlin ʿaẓīmin
